meaningMnemonic: There's <radical>power</radical>, <radical>power</radical>, and <radical>power</radical> stacked on top of the <radical>moon</radical>, <kanji>threaten</kanji>ing to bring it down!
readingMnemonic: This extra power-filled moon is now trying to <kanji>threaten</kanji> the safety of <reading>きょう</reading>と. All of きょうと is shaking and getting dark as the moon comes closer and closer.
